Went on an impromptu aurora viewing trip & thankfully found this wonderful, clean home to stay the weekend! Having two bathrooms and a full laundry area was a huge plus. The home is absolutely lovely, it is obvious a lot of thought went into the decor and the design of the spaces. It was so peaceful there.
The bedding is some of the softest and coziest I've experienced. The bath towels were super thick & absorbent. The bathrooms were very clean & had ample counter space & hooks. The furniture was all in very good shape and comfortable. It was nice to have so many reclining chairs available.
The best feature is the lake view. You can see it from the living room, enclosed porch, and the main bedroom. The view is spectacular!
If you end up staying here, know that you will be walking through uneven grass to get to the property. It was slippery after the rain, and I could see it being an issue for anyone with mobility problems. Otherwise, it's overall a perfect location!

First and foremost, I want to say we had a fantastic experience in your home! It was beautiful and very clean. We really enjoyed the comfy blankets and being so close to downtown. Bathrooms:
More towels and/or bigger towels provided
Kleenex boxes provided in all bathrooms
There was very little body wash left in each container and no shampoo/conditioner provided. I would suggest installing these units in each shower that have 3 compartmentsâ€¦1 for shower wash, 1 for shampoo, and 1 for conditioner. It would be easier to add to those rather than trying to keep up with replacing body wash containers.
Kitchen:
Personally, I suggest removing all candles from an Airbnb. As a fellow business person, having actual candles in an Airbnb seems like too much of a risk for potential issuesâ€¦fires & burns. Not worth the risk.
Bedrooms:
Add TVs in each bedroom. These days TVs are cheap. Having large flatscreen TVs mounted on the walls is easy and very luxurious and desirable for families with children and teens.
Unit overall:
I would suggest providing Info either online or in unit itself on nearest grocery stores for essentials, as well as nearest pharmacy & hospitals/doc in the box for emergencies.

review_text:
We had a nice stay at Bob and Reama's cabin. It was very clean, communication and check-in were easy, no hiccups at all, etc. This is a good choice if you are in the Ashtabula area and need a reliable place to stay. Many businesses were closed due to this being more of a seasonal destination, but we were easily able to find anything we needed within a 10-15 minute drive (if not less).
That said, the cabin didn't quite hit the mark for us. The location is a bit awkward - surrounded by gravel and overlooking a baseball diamond, with Lake Erie technically visible but certainly too far to be enjoyable from the porch. There was no kitchen table (TV trays were available), the sheets and blankets were very thin over an uneven mattress, we were unable to find any provided bath soap or shampoo, and the water heater was too small to take back-to-back warm showers.
None of these items are dealbreakers since the cleanliness and newness of the property offset some of the weak points. But hopefully this helps others know what to expect!
